variable.name: sb_autoupdate
variable.description: Enabled auto-updates (pings & refreshes status) servers from actually marked server sources in Server Browser.

boolean.true: auto-refresh server list when first entering Server Browser menu
boolean.false: do not refresh server list automatically

variable.remarks: Usefull with sb_starttab 1 and '+cfg_load myconfig +menu_slist' in command-line.
